title: Verify valid login with correct credentials
description: User should be able to login with valid username and password
preconditions: User has registered account; Browser open to login page
steps: 1) Navigate to login page; 2) Enter valid username; 3) Enter valid password; 4) Click Login button
expected_results: User is redirected to dashboard; Welcome message displays username

title: Verify login fails with invalid password
description: System should reject login attempts with wrong password
preconditions: User has registered account; Browser open to login page
steps: 1) Navigate to login page; 2) Enter valid username; 3) Enter invalid password; 4) Click Login button
expected_results: Error message displays: Invalid credentials; User remains on login page; Account not locked (first attempt)

title: Verify password field boundary - minimum length
description: Password must meet minimum length requirement
steps: 1) Enter valid username; 2) Enter password with 7 characters (below min); 3) Submit form
expected_results: Validation error: Password must be at least 8 characters
